entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
